entities.name: NVIDIA
entities.description: NVIDIA is a company facing legal, administrative, and regulatory proceedings related to its business, including shareholder, consumer, competition, and other issues.

entities.name: MICROSOFT CORPORATION
entities.description: Microsoft Corporation is a technology company that entered into an agreement with NVIDIA in 2000 to develop and sell graphics chips and license certain technology for use in the Xbox.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA and Microsoft Corporation have an agreement to develop and sell graphics chips and license certain technology for use in the Xbox.
